text:
Producer, what direction do you
think the artist photos should take?

Well, I have an idea,
though I wouldn't say it's a must-do.

But, that's just the image I have in
mind for Hiori, the idol I envision.

Yeah. Hiori, how do you want people to
see you in the outfits you'll be wearing?

While you'll receive various instructions from the photographer
on the day, having an idea of the vibe you want would be helpful.

As for me...
I'm not particularly good at smiling brightly...
At the very least, I don't want to lie.

...That's not an image, is it?
I'll think about it a bit more.
